name: webgame-platform
description: A platform for uploading and playing web games.

scripts.background: pm2 delete server || true && pm2 delete client || true && pm2 start src/app.ts --name server --interpreter ts-node && pm2 start npm --name client -- run dev --prefix client
scripts.gpt:
cp gpt.txt chat.txt && npm run tree && cat tree.txt >> chat.txt && echo "
" >> chat.txt &&cat README.md >> chat.txt && echo package.json >> chat.txt && cat package.json >> chat.txt && echo ./client/package.json >> chat.txt && cat ./client/package.json >> chat.txt

author: Your Name
